'''Radiant Spincrystal 147''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Dance of the Brown Deer]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located in [[Xalac Vale]] by the viewpoint and [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[Reflections of a Painted World]]''.
